Global Swimming Pool Pumps Market Size (2024 to 2029)

The global swimming pool pumps market size was worth USD 2.20 billion in 2023 and the global market is anticipated to reach USD 3.77 billion by 2029, growing at a CAGR of 6.1% from 2024 to 2029.

MARKET DRIVERS

The swimming pool pump market is expected to experience a significant surge due to the growing interest in sports and the promotion of a healthy lifestyle.

The growth of infrastructure and building sectors is increasing the demand for new swimming pool pumps, which in turn is increasing the demand for swimming pool pumps. Recent technical developments in the water pump industry have enhanced services like upkeep, centralized control, and customization of pre-existing pool bases. The global market is bolstered by a surge in global interest in water sports events and increased participation in swimming sports. Also, it is expected to expand due to the growth of the tourism sector, increased building activities, urbanization, increased swimming club memberships and rising disposable income.

Technological advancements in the swimming pool industry are further boosting the global swimming pool pumps market growth.

The growth of the global swimming pool pump market is also driven by the technological advancements in personal pools and robotic pool cleaners. For instance, the rise in the use of artificial intelligence in the swimming pool industry to improve user experience and efficiency by automatically adjusting speed and power consumption has been noticed and this trend is likely to fuel during the forecast period. AI technology offers convenience, control, and optimization through remote pump monitoring, resource allocation optimization, and production process streamlining, thereby reducing costs and improving product quality.

MARKET RESTRAINTS

Concerns associated with using swimming pool pumps, such as overheating, are hampering the global market growth.

Motor overheating is a major problem with pool pumps that can considerably lower their effectiveness. In addition, summertime is when this issue is most common because of the high temperatures and continuous motor use that can lead to overheating and eventual malfunction. Several obstacles prevent the swimming pool pump market from growing overall. These include the scarcity of qualified engineers and manufacturers, the seasonality of sales and the unpredictability of the climate, the increase in raw material prices, and the fierce competition in the major trading nations.

Impact Of COVID-19 On the Global Swimming Pool Pumps Market

The global swimming pool pump market experienced a short downturn because of COVID-19. The abrupt closure of its primary consumer markets, such as commercial pools, negatively impacted the tight and restrictive movement instructions. Pool pumps became less in demand as public areas, particularly swimming pools, closed, and the building industry experienced difficulties. The pandemic also reduced the use of residential pools, which had a detrimental effect on the market. During the COVID-19, pool maintenance and servicing were discontinued. On the other hand, pool operations restarted during the post-pandemic period, and demand for pool pumps increased, which was ascribed to the growth rate of the market.

SEGMENTAL ANALYSIS

Global Swimming Pool Pumps Market Analysis By Type

The single-speed pool pump segment accounted for a significant portion of the swimming pool pump market as these pumps run continuously and offer pool owners a dependable and easy-to-use option. Their simplicity of use and lower starting cost when compared to multi-speed pumps are the main reasons for their appeal. Many owners of residential pools prefer them because they are simple to install and maintain.

There are also many types of pool pumps in the variable speed section. This can be attributed to their extended lifespan, digital control, enhanced diagnostic capabilities, lower vibration, quieter operation, and cooler operating temperatures. The greatest alternative available in the industry can be regarded as variable-speed pool pumps, which are 90% more efficient than regular one-speed pumps. Consequently, there's a rise in demand for pool pump segments with variable speeds.

Global Swimming Pool Pumps Market Analysis By Application

The commercial segment is projected to have the maximum share of the swimming pool pump market. The rapid growth of the building and infrastructure sectors is causing an increase in the demand for newly constructed swimming pools. Moreover, the market segment's demand is fueled by an increase in water sports enthusiasts and their involvement in swimming sports.

The public swimming pools segment is projected to dominate the market due to increasing investments in public infrastructure construction. Governments and municipalities are enhancing public recreational spaces, including swimming pools, to promote physical fitness and community involvement, potentially driving the market for durable pool pumps.

Global Swimming Pool Pumps Market Analysis By Power Source

The electric segment had a significant proportion of the market. The reason behind this is because it is reliable and efficient. These pumps offer superior performance, extended lifespan, easy installation, low maintenance, and versatility, making them popular among pool owners due to their adaptability to various pool shapes and sizes.

Global Swimming Pool Pumps Market Analysis By Distribution Channel

The offline segment retained a significant portion of the swimming pool pump market. This is due to the ability of offline retailers including home improvement stores and specialist pool equipment stores to allow customers to physically inspect products before making a purchase. These retailers do away with delivery delays and offer instant product possession. They also have knowledgeable employees driving the segment by providing counsel and direction on product selection, installation, and maintenance.

REGIONAL ANALYSIS

North America had the major share of the global swimming pool pumps market in 2023.

The hot and muggy weather makes pool pumps more necessary for both home and commercial pools. In addition, many people in this area own homes with pools and earn higher incomes. Because of the region's significant pool enthusiast population, well-established pool infrastructure, a growing number of pump manufacturing facilities, and a surge in athletic events, the North American market is predicted to continue expanding. As a result, there will be a greater need for swimming pool pumps than there is supply, which will accelerate market expansion.

The Asia Pacific region is expected to grow quickly in the years to come in the global market.

This is due to the region's burgeoning middle class, rising rates of urbanization, and rising disposable income. Further, pool-equipped residential and commercial buildings are becoming more common because of these causes. With its sizable population and swift economic expansion, China is anticipated to dominate the regional market. Moreover, the nation's increasing emphasis on tourism, which includes the construction of resorts and water parks, is probably going to add to the strong demand for pool pumps there, which will support the local market.

Europe is predicted to experience a higher growth rate in the global market in the coming years.

Moreover, leading innovators like France, Italy, Spain, Norway, and Sweden have had a big impact on the industry with their strict regulations and climate-friendly policies. Major economies like the UK haven't yet had an effect that can improve the industry's standing, though. The European Heat Pump Association also recognizes that large suppliers can take advantage of prospects in Europe's emerging markets, including the Nordic and Scandinavian regions. The Energy Performance of Buildings Directive (EPBD) and the Energy Efficiency Directive are expected to facilitate market expansion in Europe. Top-selling nations included Norway, Sweden, Finland, Estonia, and Denmark.

Latin America is expected to have a steady growth rate during the forecast period.

One important factor propelling market expansion is the growing demand for swimming pools in both the residential and commercial sectors. Pool pumps are becoming more and more in demand because of the growing tendency in Latin America towards the construction of swimming pools in hotels, leisure centres and apartment buildings.

MEA accounted for the smallest portion of the swimming pool pump market in 2023.

Also, South Africa, Saudi Arabia, and the United Arab Emirates were the top contributors. In addition to these prospective markets, other growth hotspots for the predicted period include Nigeria, Nigeria, Qatar, Oman, Kuwait, Turkey, and Morocco. While appropriate infrastructure investments are necessary for African nations to guarantee effective energy use, pool heat pumps are becoming more popular as the best option to emerge over the next five years.

KEY PLAYERS IN THE GLOBAL SWIMMING POOL PUMPS MARKET

Companies playing a notable role in the global swimming pool pumps market include Kafto Manufacturing, Pahlen, Flotec, Brilix Pahlen, Raypak, Bestway, Hayward, Jandy, Pentair and Aqualux.

RECENT HAPPENINGS IN THE GLOBAL MARKET

In May 2023, Kirloskar Brothers Limited introduced the AQUA TORRENT-10 FCL, a new and improved pump series. It has numerous cutting-edge features. Its dynamically balanced rotating parts minimise vibrations, lowering the possibility of operating damage and its Cathodic Electro Deposition (CED) coating assures corrosion resistance.
